Audio.Locality: RPPN Estação Veracel, Porto Seguro, Bahia
Audio.Author: Dan Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from a bird (same as in XC123270) perched about 12-15m up in subcanopy of tall trees in white sand forest. Agitated, flitted its wings with every head movement. Playback is edited out, shortening some spaces between vocalizations.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
